Package me.dumfing.multiplayerTools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationManager  
    CaptureFlag  
    ConcurrentGameWorld
    A new version of the gameworld that is designed to be used on both the client and serverside for better simulation of how the server's world is working
    ConcurrentGameWorld.KillInfo  
    MultiplayerClient
    Created by dumpl on 4/19/2017.
    MultiplayerTools
    Objects that will be sent between the client and server as well as useful variables like ports
    All classes that the server will send will be prefixed with Server and all classes that the client will send will be prefixed with Client
    MultiplayerTools.ClientConnectionRequest
    Sent by the client when they wish to connect to the server to play
    MultiplayerTools.ClientControlObject
    An object that can either hold a boolean or float for a key's state or the mouse's angle
    MultiplayerTools.ClientInfoRequest
    Sent by the client to tell the server they want basic info about the server
    MultiplayerTools.ClientKeysUpdate  
    MultiplayerTools.ClientPickedLoadout  
    MultiplayerTools.ClientPickedTeam  
    MultiplayerTools.ClientSentChatMessage
    Sent by the client to tell the server that they've sent a message
    MultiplayerTools.Keys  
    MultiplayerTools.RequestWorld  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerDetailedSummary
    TODO: determine what info should be sent in the detailed server summary
    MultiplayerTools.ServerFlagPositions  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerGameCountdown
    used in the lobby when the server is counting down to the actual game
    MultiplayerTools.ServerGameStarted  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerKillLog  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerNotifyGame
    sent to a client to tell them that they can start playing the game
    MultiplayerTools.ServerPlayerPositions  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerProjectilePositions  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerRespawnTimes  
    MultiplayerTools.ServerResponse
    The response from the server for if the client has connected as a client or if they aren't allowed on
    MultiplayerTools.ServerSentChatMessage
    Sent by the server to tell all clients that it's received a message
    MultiplayerTools.ServerSummary
    Contains the ping, amount of people on, max people on, and server's name
    MultiplayerTools.WorldInfo  
    PlayerSoldier  
    Projectile
    Created by aaronli on 2017-06-02.
    WorldMap
    An object that links the visual componenets and functional components of a map together
